author: Vonng (rh@vonng.com)
description: ISD Observation Summary for single surface station

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
    station AS "Station",
    name AS "Name",
    c.name_en AS "Country",
    ST_AsLatLonText(location) AS Location
    FROM isd.station s, LATERAL (
        SELECT name_en FROM isd.world w WHERE w.fips = s.country LIMIT 1
    ) c
    
    WHERE station = '$station';

SELECT 
name_local,
name_en,
name_cn,
format('%s, %s, %s', m49_marco, m49_middle, m49_sub) AS m49_name
FROM isd.world WHERE fips = '$country';

SELECT station, s.name, ST_AsText(location) as location, s.period,longitude,latitude,elevation,country, c.name_en AS "Country", c.name_cn AS "国家" FROM isd.station s,
  LATERAL (SELECT name_en, name_cn FROM isd.world w WHERE w.fips = s.country) c
  WHERE station = '$station'

SELECT ss.station, ss.name, w.iso2, w.name_en AS "Country", w.name_cn AS "国家", longitude, latitude FROM 
(SELECT station, s.name, ST_AsText(location) as location, s.period,longitude,latitude,elevation,country FROM isd.station s
 WHERE country = '$country' AND period && daterange($__timeFrom()::DATE, $__timeTo()::DATE)) ss
LEFT JOIN isd.world w ON ss.country = w.fips

SELECT station, name, '$location'::GEOMETRY::GEOGRAPHY <-> h.location::GEOGRAPHY AS distance,
       country, ST_AsLatLonText(location) AS location, elevation, begin_date::TEXT AS start, end_date::TEXT AS end
FROM isd.station h
ORDER BY '$location'::GEOMETRY <-> h.location LIMIT 16;

SELECT extract(year FROM year) AS year,m1,m2,m3,m4,m5,m6,m7,m8,m9,m10,m11,m12 
FROM isd.history WHERE station = '$station';

SELECT to_char(ts, 'YYYY') AS year, -- 年份时间戳,yyyy-01-01
       temp_min,                    -- 年最低气温
       temp_max,                    -- 年最高气温
       dewp_min,                    -- 年最低露点
       dewp_max,                    -- 年最高露点
       prcp_sum,                    -- 年总降水
       prcp_max,                    -- 年最大降水
       wdsp_max,                    -- 年最大风速
       gust_max,                    -- 年最大阵风
       sunny_days,                  -- 年晴天日数
       windy_days,                  -- 年大风日数
       foggy_days,                  -- 年雾天日数
       rainy_days,                  -- 年雨天日数
       snowy_days,                  -- 年雪天日数
       hail_days,                   -- 年冰雹日数
       thunder_days,                -- 年雷暴日数
       tornado_days,                -- 年龙卷日数
       hot_days,                    -- 年高温日数
       cold_days,                   -- 年低温日数
       vis_4_days,                  -- 年能见度4km内日数
       vis_10_days,                 -- 年能见度4-10km内日数
       vis_20_days,                 -- 年能见度10-20km内日数
       vis_20p_days,                 -- 年能见度20km上日数
       '' AS comment
FROM isd.yearly
WHERE station = '$station' 
-- AND $__timeFilter(ts)
ORDER BY 1;

SELECT 
       min(temp_min)     AS temp_min,     -- 最低气温
       max(temp_max)     AS temp_max,     -- 最高气温
       max(prcp_sum)     AS prcp_sum,     -- 总降水
       max(prcp_max)     AS prcp_max,     -- 最大降水
       max(wdsp_max)     AS wdsp_max,     -- 最大风速
       max(gust_max)     AS gust_max,     -- 最大阵风
       max(sunny_days)   AS sunny_days,   -- 晴天日数
       max(windy_days)   AS windy_days,   -- 大风日数
       max(foggy_days)   AS foggy_days,   -- 雾天日数
       max(rainy_days)   AS rainy_days,   -- 雨天日数
       max(snowy_days)   AS snowy_days,   -- 雪天日数
       max(hail_days)    AS hail_days,    -- 冰雹日数
       max(thunder_days) AS thunder_days, -- 雷暴日数
       max(tornado_days) AS tornado_days, -- 龙卷日数
       max(hot_days)     AS hot_days,     -- 高温日数
       max(cold_days)    AS cold_days,    -- 低温日数
       max(vis_4_days)   AS vis_4_days,   -- 能见度4km内日数
       max(vis_20p_days) AS vis_20p_days  -- 能见度20km上日数
FROM isd.yearly
WHERE station = '$station'
GROUP by station
ORDER BY 1;

SELECT to_char(ts, 'YYYY-MM') AS month, -- 月份
       to_char(ts + '1Month'::INTERVAL, 'YYYY-MM') AS next_month, -- 下个月份
       temp_mean    ,-- 月平均气温
       temp_min     ,-- 月平均最低气温
       temp_max     ,-- 月平均最高气温
       temp_min_avg ,-- 月极端最低气温
       temp_max_avg ,-- 月极端最高气温
       dewp_mean    ,-- 月平均露点
       dewp_min     ,-- 月最低露点
       dewp_max     ,-- 月最高露点
       slp_mean     ,-- 月平均气压
       prcp_sum     ,-- 月总降水
       prcp_max     ,-- 月最大降水
       prcp_mean    ,-- 月平均降水
       wdsp_mean    ,-- 月平均风速
       wdsp_max     ,-- 月最大风速
       gust_max     ,-- 月最大阵风
       sunny_days   ,-- 月晴天日数
       windy_days   ,-- 月大风日数
       foggy_days   ,-- 月雾天日数
       rainy_days   ,-- 月雨天日数
       snowy_days   ,-- 月雪天日数
       hail_days    ,-- 月冰雹日数
       thunder_days ,-- 月雷暴日数
       tornado_days ,-- 月龙卷日数
       hot_days     ,-- 月高温日数
       cold_days    ,-- 月低温日数
       vis_4_days   ,-- 月能见度4km内日数
       vis_10_days  ,-- 月能见度4-10km内日数
       vis_20_days  ,-- 月能见度10-20km内日数
       vis_20p_days , -- 月能见度20km上日数
       extract(epoch FROM ts)::TEXT  AS link_from,
       extract(epoch FROM (ts+'1month'::Interval))::TEXT AS link_to
FROM isd.monthly
WHERE station = '$station' 
-- AND $__timeFilter(ts)
ORDER BY 1;

panels.description:
天气现象 FRSHTT (Fog/Rain/Snow/Hail/Thunder/Tornado)

Sunny     晴天（无雾雨雪雹雷龙卷的天气）

Foggy     雾天

Rainy     雨天

Snowy     雪天

Hail      冰雹

Thunder   雷暴

Tornado   龙卷

Windy 大风天气 (最大风速 > 17.2m/s)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT ts AS time,
       (NOT is_foggy AND NOT is_rainy AND NOT is_snowy AND NOT is_hail AND NOT is_thunder AND
        NOT is_tornado)::INTEGER AS "Sunny",
       is_foggy::INTEGER         AS "Foggy",
       is_rainy::INTEGER         AS "Rainy",
       is_snowy::INTEGER         AS "Snowy",
       is_hail::INTEGER          AS "Hail",
       is_thunder::INTEGER       AS "Thunder",
       is_tornado::INTEGER       AS "Tornado",
       (wdsp_max >= 17.2)::INTEGER AS "Windy" 
FROM isd.daily
WHERE station = '$station' AND $__timeFilter(ts);

panels.title: Weather Status (FRSHTT)

panels.description: 日均气温，最高气温，最低气温共同组成本图。底部柱状图表示该记录由多少条亚小时级观测记录聚合计算而成（通常应当为24条，每小时一次）

targets.rawSql:
SELECT ts::DATE AS time,
       temp_mean AS "Average",
       temp_min  AS "Minimum",
       temp_max  AS "Maximum",
       temp_count AS "Count"
FROM isd.daily
WHERE station = '$station' AND $__timeFilter(ts);

panels.title: Temperature / 气温

panels.description:
相对湿度（英文：relative humidity）是指单位体积空气中，实际水蒸气的分压与相同温度和体积下水饱和蒸气压的百分比。 也就是绝对湿度与最高湿度之间的比，它的值显示水蒸气的饱和度有多高。 在当前的气温之下，空气里的水分含量达至饱和，相对湿度就是100%。

请注意：相对湿度由 日均露点 和 日均气温通过公式计算得到，在极端温度下可能失真。

targets.rawSql:
SELECT ts::DATE AS time,
       power(
                   (112.0 - dewp_mean * 0.1 + temp_mean) / (112 + 0.9 * dewp_mean)  + 0.0000001,
                   (8.7 / (dewp_mean - temp_mean + 0.0000001))
           ) AS rh
FROM isd.daily
WHERE station = '$station' AND $__timeFilter(ts);

panels.title: Relative Humidity / 相对湿度

panels.description:
气象站测量的气压将折算为海平面大气压。

下方紫色柱状条反应了该日均气压由多少条亚小时级原始观测数据聚合而来（通常24条以内）

targets.rawSql:
SELECT ts::DATE AS time,
       slp_mean  AS "Sea Level Pressure",
       1013.25   AS "ATM",
       slp_count AS "Count"
FROM isd.daily
WHERE station = '$station' AND $__timeFilter(ts);

panels.title: Sea Level Pressure / 海平面气压

panels.description:
wdsp_mean: Average Wind Speed /  平均风速

wdsp_max: Max Wind Speed /  最大持续风速

gust: Gust Wind Speed /  阵风风速

targets.rawSql:
SELECT ts::DATE AS time,
       wdsp_mean  AS "Average",
       wdsp_max   AS "Maximum",
       gust AS "Gust"
FROM isd.daily
WHERE station = '$station' AND $__timeFilter(ts);

panels.title: Wind Speed / 风速

targets.rawSql:
SELECT ts::DATE AS time,
       prcp  AS "Precipitation",
       sndp   AS "Snow Depth"
FROM isd.daily
WHERE station = '$station' AND $__timeFilter(ts);

panels.title: Precipitation & Snow Depth /  降水 & 降雪

list.definition:
SELECT station, sum(total)
FROM isd.history
GROUP BY station
ORDER BY 2 DESC NULLS LAST;
list.label: Station
list.name: station
list.query:
SELECT station, sum(total)
FROM isd.history
GROUP BY station
ORDER BY 2 DESC NULLS LAST;

list.definition: SELECT name FROM isd.station WHERE station = '$station';
list.label: Station
list.name: name
list.query: SELECT name FROM isd.station WHERE station = '$station';

list.definition: SELECT location FROM isd.station WHERE station = '$station';
list.label: Location
list.name: location
list.query: SELECT location FROM isd.station WHERE station = '$station';

list.name: country
list.query: SELECT country FROM isd.station WHERE station = '$station';

list.definition: SELECT name_en FROM isd.world WHERE fips = '${country}'

title: ISD Station
